name: coderdojo-first-game-electron-client
description: CoderDojo First Game Electron Client [CDFGEC] Is a component of [Project HSI]'s CDFG Launcher. It is used to provide a web browser experience without using chrome or something, also makes the thing cross compatible if needed. The code in it's entirely can be found on ProjectHSI/coderdojo-first-game-launcher.
author: [Project HSI]
